attributes.action: Make airlines cancel all flights to countries not on safe list
attributes.additional_details: Certain airlines are continuing flights to destinations that are against FCO travelers advice making the customers having to cancel their holidays or flights knowing that they have no right to refunds because flights have gone ahead as scheduled
attributes.background: To make it fair to all UK citizens the government should make all airlines cancel flights to non covid safe countries eliminating the financial burden of thousands who cannot get refunds, insurance and cannot afford to self isolate for 14 days on return
